Workflow Verification Summary
==============================

✅ Workflow File Created: auto-pr-to-comfyui.yml

Key Features:
-------------
1. Triggers: When pyproject.toml changes on main branch
2. Version Detection: Automatically compares current vs previous version
3. Changelog Generation: Extracts commits and merged PRs
4. Fork Operations: Updates requirements.txt in comfyui-wiki/ComfyUI
5. PR Creation: Creates draft PR to comfyanonymous/ComfyUI
6. Notifications: GitHub will send notifications automatically

Target Repositories:
-------------------
- Source: Comfy-Org/embedded-docs
- Fork: comfyui-wiki/ComfyUI  
- Target: comfyanonymous/ComfyUI (base: master)

Required Setup:
--------------
1. Create GitHub PAT with permissions:
   - Repository access to comfyui-wiki/ComfyUI
   - Contents: Read and write
   - Pull requests: Read and write

2. Add secret to embedded-docs repository:
   - Name: COMFYUI_FORK_TOKEN
   - Value: Your PAT from step 1

3. Ensure ComfyUI fork has requirements.txt file

Branch Naming:
-------------
Format: update-docs-{VERSION}-{TIMESTAMP}
Example: update-docs-0.3.1-20251030-143022

PR Title Format:
---------------
"Update docs to v{VERSION}"
Example: "Update docs to v0.3.1"

Changelog Includes:
------------------
- PyPI package link
- GitHub release link
- Merged pull requests since last version
- Individual commits since last version

Next Steps:
----------
1. Add COMFYUI_FORK_TOKEN to repository secrets
2. Test with a version bump (e.g., 0.3.0 → 0.3.1)
3. Verify draft PR is created successfully
4. Check GitHub notifications
